ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISBLANK(Start_date__c)),OR(OR(VALUE(LEFT( Start_date__c ,2)) >12,VALUE(LEFT( Start_date__c ,2)) <= 00),IF( YEAR( TODAY()) < VALUE( RIGHT( Start_date__c , 4)),true,false),IF( YEAR(TODAY()) = VALUE(RIGHT( Start_date__c , 4)),IF(MONTH(TODAY()) < VALUE(LEFT( Start_date__c , 2)),true, false), false),NOT(REGEX( Start_date__c , '[0-1][0-9]/[2][0][0-9]{2}'))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Format should be MM/YYYY , year and month should not be the future
